channel.title: AI Winter on Wassim Seifeddine
channel.description: Recent content in AI Winter on Wassim Seifeddine

item.title: On Apple intelligence, LLM limitations and the next AI winter
item.description: Apple intelligence is a project that has been in the works for a while now, and it has been rumored to be a major feature in iOS 18 and the new iPhone 16. However, the project has faced several delays, and it seems that Apple is struggling to get it right. In this post, I will share my thoughts on the reasons behind these delays and what they mean for the future of Apple intelligence and AI.
